content: अनुमंत्र् {c10c} <ab>A.</ab> To consecrate or accompany with sacred hymns or magical formulas; to dismiss with sacred and auspicious words, dismiss with a blessing; विसृष्टश्च वामदेवानुमंत्रितोऽश्वः <ls>U. 2</ls> (<ab>v. l.</ab> for अभिमंत्रित); रथमारोप्य कृष्णेन यत्र कर्णोऽ नुमंत्रितः <ls>Mb.</ls>
